(Background: Still an issue for Style Linking in MS Word for Mac. Tested Sept. 2018)

Advance Width (zero or negative)

Advance Width (zero or negative)

Info

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedThin.ttf)

hmtx

advance

Pull glyphs with advance width zero.

'NULL' (uni0000) (ID 1) = '0'.
'viramasinh' (uni0DCA) (ID 65) = '0'.
'ivowelsignsinh' (uni0DD2) (ID 69) = '0'.
'iivowelsignsinh' (uni0DD3) (ID 70) = '0'.
'uvowelsignsinh' (uni0DD4) (ID 71) = '0'.
'uuvowelsignsinh' (uni0DD6) (ID 72) = '0'.
'rephsinh' (ID 128) = '0'.
'rakarsinh' (ID 130) = '0'.
'karasinh' (ID 134) = '0'.
'kharasinh' (ID 135) = '0'.
'garasinh' (ID 136) = '0'.
'gharasinh' (ID 137) = '0'.
'ngarasinh' (ID 138) = '0'.
'nngarasinh' (ID 139) = '0'.
'carasinh' (ID 140) = '0'.
'charasinh' (ID 141) = '0'.
'jarasinh' (ID 142) = '0'.

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedBlack.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedBlack.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedBlack.ttf)

OS/2

usBreakChar

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Installable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

STAT table

STAT table

Info

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedThin.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

name

MS NID 4

NID 4 length is '35' but shouldn't be longer than 31 characters.
'Noto Sans Sinhala UI Condensed Thin'

Warning

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedThin.ttf)

name

NID 4 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI Condensed Thin' ≠ NID 1 'Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Thin'

Check Width Names Full Font Name NID4

The width name should be before weight name. NID 4 is correct: 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI Condensed Thin'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedThin.ttf)

name/head

MS NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 2.000;GOOG;noto-source:20170915:90ef993387c0' does match fontRevision 'Version 2.0'.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '31' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedThin'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedThin', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedThin', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedThin.ttf)

name

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI Condensed Thin' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Thin' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedExtraLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

MS NID 6

NID 6 contains correct campel case: 'CondensedExtraLight, CondensedExtraLight, CondensedExtraLight'

Error

'Noto is a trademark of Google Inc.'
but what do think about this

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI Condensed ExtraLight' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala Cond ExtLt' (NID 1).

Pass

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Light Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

'NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedLight'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Light Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Light Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Light Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Light Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Light Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Light Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI Condensed Light' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Light' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Light Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-Condensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

'NotoSansSinhalaUI-Condensed'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-Condensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-Condensed', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-Condensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-Condensed', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-Condensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-Condensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-Condensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-Condensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI Condensed' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala Cond' (NID 1).

Pass

NID 17: OK. No camel case required.

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Med Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '33' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedMedium'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Med Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedMedium', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Med Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedMedium', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Med Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Med Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Med Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Med Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI Condensed Medium' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Med' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond SemBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '35' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedSemiBold'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond SemBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedSemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond SemBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedSemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond SemBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond SemBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond SemBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond SemBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI Condensed SemiBold' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala Cond SemBd' (NID 1).

Pass

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.'

Error

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

name

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '31' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedBold'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI Condensed Bold' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Bold' (NID 1 + 'Space' + NID 2).

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '36' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedExtraBold'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedExtraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedExtraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI Condensed ExtraBold' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala Cond ExtBd' (NID 1).

Pass

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '32' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedBlack'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedBlack', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedBlack', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI Condensed Black' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Blk' (NID 1).

Pass

Underline Position and Thickness

Underline Position and Thickness

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedThin.ttf)

post

underline position and thickness

underlinePosition should be a negative and underlineThickness not 0 or negative.

underlinePosition is '-100'.
underlineThicknes is '50'.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedExtraLight.ttf)

post

underline position and thickness

underlinePosition should be a negative and underlineThickness not 0 or negative.

underlinePosition is '-100'.
underlineThicknes is '50'.

Pass

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedThin.ttf)

GPOS

kern

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

GPOS table does not have kerning feature. Please investigate if this meets requirements.

Info

Noto Sans Sinhala Cond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-CondensedThin.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in font.

Font has no 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.

Error

sTypeAsc/Desc and unitsPerEm

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value.

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender (1362) match or exceed the unitsPerEm value (1000).

Info

Every PostScript name is fine.
